description: This file contains CSS styles and variables for theme management in a web interface, including definitions for light and dark themes, general layout styles, animations, and responsive design adjustments.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container that defines overall layout and theming.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Defines the header section of the application with layout styles.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links in the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including hover and active states.
